Description:
We are looking for a responsible Administrative Assistant to provide assistance in day-to-day office management with efficiency.Your job responsibilities include (but not limited to);Attend the general queries from the main desk.
Answer to inquiries received through the Company's Digital Channels.
Document Handling
Ensuring all admin-related tasks are completed on time.
Reporting & assistance to senior management.Skills
Skills:
Fluency in English.
Complete knowledge of Computer Systems & MS Office Suite.
Prior experience in the same or similar role will be preferred.
Punctuality, Efficiency and quick-thinking Skills.
Doer Personality.
